import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import ItemCard from '../components/ItemCard'; import { getRecentItems } from '../services/itemService'; const Home = () => { const [recentItems, setRecentItems] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { const fetchRecentItems = async () => { try { const data = await getRecentItems(); setRecentItems(data); setLoading(false); } catch (err) { setError('Failed to load recent items'); setLoading(false); } }; fetchRecentItems(); }, []); return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Lost Something?

The PICT College Lost & Found portal helps students find their lost belongings. Browse through items that have been found on campus and claim what's yours.

Browse Lost Items Learn More
{/* How It Works Section */}

How It Works

Reuniting students with their lost belongings in a few simple steps.

1

Find Item

Lost items found on campus are submitted to the security office by students or staff.

2

Submit Info

Security personnel log the item with details and photos in our system.

3

Claim & Collect

Students can browse, identify their belongings, claim online, and collect items from security.

{/* Recent Items Section */}

Recently Found Items

View All Items →

)}

); }; export default Home;
